title: Clouse's Houses - A story of challenge, creativity, and the heart of an architect
description: "I am an architect. More significantly I am a female architect - born of an incredibly determined woman - with a journey to share." Clouse's Houses is a story woven with a yarn of architecture, but it is not about architecture. It is about nature and art, relationships and afflictions, and a little bit about dogs. But theses are just the stories that unfold to tell a deeper journey of challenge, change, compassion, and creativity. Clouse's Houses is about seeking and discovering, and soaking in the spirit of life."Clouse's Houses is the story of finding the perfect tension between art and science, security and freedom, nature and habitat, love and loss." Both comedic and soulful, it is a compelling and engaging read that will make you laugh, cry, sigh, and soar!
author: Carol Clouse
